snippet: Ecumenical Patriarch Bartholomew I of Constantinople has preached that caring for the environment is a religious imperative, a stance he has taken far enough to be considered revolutionary by some theologians.
abstract: Ecumenical Patriarch Bartholomew I of Constantinople, spiritual leader of world's Orthodox Christians, continues to deepen his commitment to environmentalism, which he sees as a religious imperative; Bartholomew's stance on the issue has been called revolutionary by some theologians.
lead_paragraph: Ecumenical Patriarch Bartholomew I of Constantinople has preached that caring for the environment is a religious imperative, a stance he has taken far enough to be considered revolutionary by some theologians.

headline.seo: Bartholomew I of Constantinople’s Bold Green Stance
headline.main: Orthodox Leader Deepens Progressive Stance on Environment
headline.print_headline: Orthodox Leader Deepens Progressive Stance on Environment
